title: Denim jeans for casual wear
description:
[SHORT_DESC]

Step into effortless street fashion with our Crochet Flower Denim Jeans, where classic denim meets unique, handcrafted details. Designed for women who love to stand out, these jeans combine everyday comfort with bold, eye-catching style.

[WHY_LOVE]

Unique Design: Handcrafted crochet flower accents add a playful, stylish edge to classic denim.

Flattering Fit: Slim, tight-leg cut with medium elasticity offers both comfort and shape.

Versatile Style: Perfect for streetwear, casual outings, or dressing up with heels and accessories.

Premium Fabric: Made from high-quality cotton denim with just the right thickness for year-round wear.

Color Variety: Available in Light Blue, Dark Blue, and Black to match your vibe.

[SIZE_FIT]

Asian sizes run 1–2 sizes smaller than US/EU sizing. If between sizes, choose the larger size.

Please allow 2–3cm difference due to manual measurement.

Colors may vary slightly depending on screen display.

[FABRIC_CARE]
Fabric: 95% Polyester, 5% Elastane
Feel: Soft, slightly stretchy, and smooth
Care Instructions: Hand wash or professional dry clean

[WHATS_INCLUDED]
1 x Women’s Denim Jeans

title: Elegant Floral Pleated Maxi Dress – Backless Sleeveless Gown for All Seasons
description:
[SHORT_DESC]

Step into effortless elegance with this Floral Pleated Maxi Dress. Designed with a backless bandoleer neckline, flowy pleated hem, and vibrant floral print, this sleeveless long dress is perfect for all seasons—ideal for vacations, parties, or casual daytime events.

[WHY_LOVE]

Style: Bandoleer neckline with open back and delicate pleated hem

Fit: Regular fit with A-line silhouette for a flattering flowy look

Season: Perfect for all seasons

Effortless Wear: Lightweight polyester fabric with a breezy, elegant drape

Occasion Ready: Ideal for vacations, summer parties, weddings, or garden events

[SIZE_FIT]

Fit Type: Regular

Length: Maxi / Floor-Length

Sleeve: Sleeveless

Customer Group: Adult Women

Gender: Women

[FABRIC_CARE]
Fabric: 100% Polyester

Feel: Lightweight, soft, and non-stretch

Care Instructions: Machine wash or professional dry clean
[WHATS_INCLUDED]
1 x Elegant Floral Pleated Maxi Dress
